content: मुद्गरः [मुदं गिरति गॄ-अच्] {@--1@} A hammer, mallet, as in मोहमुद्गरः (a small poem by Śaṅkarācārya); <ls>R. 12. 73.</ls> {@--2@} A club, mace. {@--3@} A staff for breaking clods of earth. {@--4@} A kind of dumb-bell. {@--5@} A bud. {@--6@} A kind of jasmine (said to to be {%<ab>n.</ab>%} also in this sense).
